actions.name: Cavalry Charge

cost.trigger: If the user Moves in a straight line toward a target before Attacking with a [Contact] Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: If the user Moves in a straight line toward a target before Attacking with a [Contact] Attack.
Effect: The Power of the user's forthcoming Attack is increased by 5% for per space moved in a straight line in the current Activation. If the user does not use any Movement during their Activation they may spend this Ability's PP Cost to gain @Affliction[resolved] 2.
